content: I'm having trouble getting a hook_update_N to fire for upgrades in a module and I am not sure why. The module's schema version is 7002 so that should trigger it. I tried hook_update_1000 and then when that didn't fire I tried hook_update_1100.

One thing to note is that the upgrade process was completed before this module was ported and I'm trying to do this after the fact -- is that a bad idea? It seems the database update should still be flagged in this case, but maybe I'm wrong.

If I manually set the schema to a lower number it does trigger the update. I think this is coming back to me now... Ideally needs to happen during the upgrade process, otherwise requires some special sauce.
Do you have the last update hook defined?
